answers.answer: Drink lots of water , cold or warm compressors in your head. Warm baths or try and sleep more. There's not much really to do. I had a massive headache last week that lasted the whole week and pretty much tried it all even Tylenol and nothing helps. Its suppose to be the hormones as well I was told by my Dr. Ugh
Drink lots of water try to add fruit slices for flavor if you need too. Snack on fruits and dried nuts you need energy. Don't take too much pills not good for the baby.

Have you been to the doctor about the headaches ?? They are a sign of preeclampsia which can be very dangerous for you and the baby. It develops after 12 weeks my mothers friend almost lost her baby because she didn't get checked once she started having headaches.

The Dr didn't tell me anything he just said I can't do anything about them....I drink only water it's driving me crazy because I have my kids to care for and it's so hard with these headaches :( thanks for your help ladies I will try all hope it helps...I wish I could change Dr's but he's the only one in our town...

question: I have headaches day and night I don't know what to do anymore to relieve the pain I tried Tylenol and it will not work at all....have you ladies tried anything different to take the pain away please
title: 14 weeks 4 days
